snippet: Readers ask questions about a gang leader caught carrying a book of poems as well as the reason for green lights outside police precinct stations.
abstract: FYI column recalls 1940s Brooklyn gangster named Oscar the Poet and explains green lights outside police precinct stations.
lead_paragraph: Readers ask questions about a gang leader caught carrying a book of poems as well as the reason for green lights outside police precinct stations.

headline.main: Was There a Gangster Called Oscar the Poet?
